import RowHeaderIndexZero from './RowHeaderIndexZero?dev-site-examples';
import RowHeaderIndexOne from './RowHeaderIndexOne?dev-site-examples';
import RowHeaderIndexTwo from './RowHeaderIndexTwo?dev-site-examples';

# Row Header Cell Content

This examples demonstrates a [Compact Interactive List](/components/cerner-terra-framework-docs/compact-interactive-list/about) 
with 3 semantic columns: Service name, Details, Featured.

In this example, the `rowHeaderIndex=0`, which makes the first column **Service name** the row header.

<RowHeaderIndexZero/>

In this example, the `rowHeaderIndex=1`, which makes the second column **Details** the the row header.

<RowHeaderIndexOne/>

In this example, the `rowHeaderIndex=2`, which makes the last column with the **Featured*** button the row header.

<RowHeaderIndexTwo/>
